bibl.title: Three Roman-Period Papyri in the Beinecke Library.
bibl.note: 1. P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 844. Account of a Bath with a Beer Shop. Oxyrhynchus, 27 November - 26 December 54. - 2. Inv. 687. Contract between a Marine and a Desert Guard. Provenance unknown, second century. - 3. Inv. 213. Receipt for the Crown Tax. Bacchias - Hephaestias (Arsinoite nome), 27 September 226.
bibl.seg: Amin Benaissa, Three Roman-Period Papyri in the Beinecke Library.

1. P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 844. Account of a Bath with a Beer Shop. Oxyrhynchus, 27 November - 26 December 54. - 2. Inv. 687. Contract between a Marine and a Desert Guard. Provenance unknown, second century. - 3. Inv. 213. Receipt for the Crown Tax. Bacchias - Hephaestias (Arsinoite nome), 27 September 226.
